scripts.create-simple-wire: pnpm --filter create-simple-wire run build && cd .. && node simple-wire/packages/create-simple-wire/dist/index.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules starter-template/dist starter-template/node_modules packages/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/create-simple-wire/template
scripts.publish:simple-wire: pnpm --filter simple-wire run build && pnpm --filter simple-wire publish --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.publish:create-simple-wire: pnpm --filter create-simple-wire run build && pnpm --filter create-simple-wire publish --access public --no-git-checks
